reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: For the goal of enhancing women?s political empowerment and leadership in Egypt WMF proposes a project that builds a knowledge base on women?s role in public and political life improving cultural perceptions and representations of women in politics. The pr oject is based on three main pillars: 1) a documentation project that highlights the role of women as leaders and activists as well as participants in the major movements for change in Egypt; 2) an oral history and feminist methodologies workshops that bui lds the capacity of researchers and activities to create alternative knowledge and history on women and politics; 3) a media campaign that increases the visibility of female politicians? role and achievements in Egyptian public and political life. This ini tiative is in line with WMF gender-based cultural mission nationally and regionally. The mission aims to contribute to: 1) the production and dissemination of alternative knowledge on women and gender issues in the Arab region; 2) a rereading of Arab tradi tion and cultural history that is supportive of women?s political social and intellectual role in society.
